name: YOU-LIS-HES
description:
Background / Story

You are going to be exiled to a forsaken island!

Have Fun Pirate Conversations!

Game Features
  • Have Fun Pirate Conversations!
  • Explore the Island!
  • Find the Crabs!
  • Face the Inevitable!
Controls
  • ESCAPE - Quit the game (there is no menu, sorry!)
  • E - Talk 
  • LEFT CLICK - Shoot GUN
  • WASD - Movement
  • MOUSE LOOK - LOOKIN'

This is a student project for infsci1061
